description: Before you meet your crew at the trailhead, zip up the Men's Alsek Jacket. Its stretch softshell fabric and articulated elbows offer freedom of movement as you're dodging debris on unexplored routes. If rain clouds move in, the PFC-free Durable Water-Repellent finish provides an extra layer of weather protection. Block wind gusts using the cord lock at the hem and VELCRO® cuffs. Just made it for an epic sunset? Access your phone and other small essentials in the zippered bicep, hand, and interior pockets.
name: Marmot Alsek Jacket - Mens
